title: reduce the leaver buster TIME
body: i always finish my games and always accept matches if I find one so when Im almost finished a game my laptop goes flat AND I GET A 20 MINUTE LEAVER BUSTER FOR IT please reduce its  time

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sorry, leaverbuster punishments cannot be removed under any circumstances.

It is your responsibility to ensure you're able to dedicate enough time to playing a full game, this includes ensuring your laptop has enough charge to last a potential 90 minutes.

For more information on leaverbuster, please see the [Leaverbuster FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)
